PeriodicSyncManager.summary: NOTE Experimental The PeriodicSyncManager interface of the provides a way to register tasks to be run in a service worker at periodic intervals with network connectivity. These tasks are referred to as periodic background sync requests. Access PeriodicSyncManager through the .

remarks.para:
-Richer offline experiences with the Periodic Background Sync API
-A Periodic Background Sync demo app

PeriodicSyncManagerGetTags.summary:
NOTE Experimental The getTags() method of the
interface returns a {{jsxref('Promise')}} that
resolves with a list of objects representing the tags that are
currently registered for periodic syncing.

remarks.para:
-Richer offline experiences with the Periodic Background Sync API
-A Periodic Background Sync demo app

PeriodicSyncManagerGetTags.returns:
A which resolves with a list of objects
representing tags that are currently registered for periodic syncing.

PeriodicSyncManagerRegister.summary:
NOTE Experimental The register() method of the
interface registers a periodic sync request with the
browser with the specified tag and options. It returns a that
resolves when the registration completes.

remarks.para:
-Richer offline experiences with the Periodic Background Sync API
-A Periodic Background Sync demo app

PeriodicSyncManagerUnregister.summary:
NOTE Experimental The unregister() method of the
interface unregisters the periodic sync request
corresponding to the specified tag and returns a that resolves
when unregistration completes.

remarks.para:
-Richer offline experiences with the Periodic Background Sync API
-A Periodic Background Sync demo app
